Arc¶

class decodes.core.dc_circle.Arc(cs, radius, sweep_angle)¶

Bases: decodes.core.dc_base.HasBasis

a circle class

Arc Constructor

Parameters:
  • cs (CS) – Coordinate system.
  • radius (float) – Radius of arc.
  • sweep_angle – Angle of arc.
Result :

Arc object
Return type:

Arc

 
my_arc=Arc(CS(Point(0,0,0)), 6.0, 1.5)
deval(t)¶

Evaluates this Arc and returns a Point. Equivalent to eval.

Parameters:t (float) – Normalized value between 0 and 1.
Result :a Point on the Arc.
Return type:Point

Parameters:t (float) – Normalized value between 0 and 1.
Result :a Plane on the Arc.
Return type:Plane

static from_pts(center, start_pt, sweep_pt, is_major=False)¶

Returns an arc using a center, a start point and a sweep point.

Parameters:
  • center (Point) – Center Point of Arc.
  • start_pt (Point) – Start Point of Arc.
  • sweep_pt (Point) – Sweep Point of Arc.
  • is_major (bool) – Boolean Value.
Result :

Arc
Return type:

Arc
static from_tan(start_pt, sweep_pt, tan)¶

Returns an arc using a start point, a sweep point and a tangent to the arc at the start point.

  • sweep_pt (Point) – Arc sweep Point.
  • tan (Vec) – Tangent vector at start point.
